content.body: The Test262File implementation may need tweaking to allow for that case
it may be a bug in bocoup/test262-stream
theoretically it shouldn't be getting there if the 0-byte file has `_FIXTURE` in the name
content.formatted_body: theoretically it shouldn't be getting there if the 0-byte file has _FIXTURE in the name

content.body: oh, I see - the requirement is `_FIXTURE` not `-FIXTURE` - see https://github.com/tc39/test262/blob/main/INTERPRETING.md#modules
content.formatted_body: oh, I see - the requirement is _FIXTURE not -FIXTURE - see https://github.com/tc39/test262/blob/main/INTERPRETING.md#modules
